meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vanuatu.
meanings.sent1: In Vanuatu, you can buy many things with vatus.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for vatus at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepts vatus, no other currency!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a thousand vatus.
meanings.sent5: The shiny vatus jingled in his pocket.

meanings.sent1: The hikers marveled at the vast vatus on the island.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the unique features of the vatus.
meanings.sent3: The birds nested in the vatus, creating a cozy home.
meanings.sent4: The vatus resembled giant bowls of fire in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The steam rising from the vatus painted a mystical picture.
